Title: Cancer Man
Plot: Walter finally tells his family that he has been stricken with cancer. Meanwhile, the DEA believes Albuquerque has a new, big time player to worry about. Meanwhile, a worthy recipient is the target of a depressed Walter's anger, and Jesse makes a surprise visit to his parents home.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: Tess Harper, Michael Bofshever, Kyle Bornheimer, Steven Michael Quezada
